#labels Phase-Deploy
This page contains instructions for installing Bungeni Metavid on Linux. It may be possible to install Bungeni Metavid on Windows but this has not been tested.

= Introduction =

Bungeni Metavid is a PHP application for the transcription of parliamentary records and is built on Metavid [[http://metavid.ucsc.edu/]]
